extension.name: System - Easy Like and Share
extension.author: Bryan Keller
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2011 Techheads IT Consulting. All rights reserved.

field.name: sidebar
field.label: Enable Icons on Side
field.description: Enable the Display of the Icons along the side of the screen.

field.name: padbottom
field.label: Margin from Bottom
field.description: Choose the Amount of space in pixels from the bottom of the screen.

field.name: padrorl
field.label: Margin L/R or Center
field.description: Choose the Amount of space in pixels from the left or the right or away from the center of the screen.

field.name: positioning
field.label: Style Fixed or Floating
field.description: Would you like the icons 'fixed' to a position on the screen or floating ie. the icons move along with the screen when scrolling.

field.name: startpos
field.label: Starting Position of Icons
field.description: Choose where the starting position of the icons originates from, either the center of the screen or the side of the screen.

field.name: orientation
field.label: Orientation of Icons
field.description: Orientation of Icons. Right or Left side of screen.

field.name: toporbot
field.label: Placement of Icons.
field.description: Placement of Icons. Either the Top of the Screen or the Bottom of the Screen.

field.name: backdrop
field.label: Display A Backdrop
field.description: Would you like to display a backdrop for your buttons.

field.name: backdropcol
field.label: Backdrop Color
field.description: The color of the backdrop in hex ex. #000000

field.name: bkdropheight
field.label: Backdrop Height
field.description: The Height of the backdrop in pixels.

field.name: bkdropwidth
field.label: Backdrop Width
field.description: The Width of the backdrop in pixels.

field.name: bkdropborder
field.label: Border Style
field.description: Choose your border style.

field.name: bkdropborwidth
field.label: Border Width
field.description: Choose your border width.

field.name: bkdropcss
field.label: Backdrop Style CSS
field.description: The CSS Style of the backdrop.

field.name: css2
field.label: CSS style
field.description: Insert a style for the buttons.

field.name: shortener
field.label: Shortener service
field.description: You can select a shortener URL service. To work properly, a PHP option 'allow_url_fopen' must be enabled. You must enable PHP curl for Google shortener service.

field.name: shortLogin
field.label: Login
field.description: Username for the shortener URL service.

field.name: shortApiKey
field.label: API key
field.description: An API key for the shortener URL service.

field.name: ogtags
field.label: Enable og Tags
field.description: Generate og Tags for your content.

field.name: ogtype
field.label: Select og Type
field.description: Choose an og Type. Embed Code {ogtype}yourtype{/ogtype}

field.name: ogtitle
field.label: Select og Title
field.description: This title will be used on all pages or leave blank to auto populate page title. Embed Code {ogtitle}yourtitle{/ogtitle}

field.name: ogdescription
field.label: Select og Desc
field.description: This description will be used on all pages or leave blank to auto populate description. Embed Code {ogdesc}yourdesc{/ogdesc}

field.name: ogurl
field.label: Select og URL
field.description: This URL will be used on all pages or leave blank to auto populate URL. Embed Code {ogurl}http://www.yoururl.com{/ogurl}

field.name: ogimage
field.label: Select og Image
field.description: This image URL will be used on all pages or leave blank to auto populate. Embed Code {ogimage}http://www.image.com/img.jpg{/ogimage}.

field.name: oglatitude
field.label: Select og Latitude
field.description: This latitude will be used on all pages. Embed Code {latitude}latitude{/latitude}

field.name: oglongitude
field.label: Select og Longitude
field.description: This longitude will be used on all pages. Embed Code {longitude}longitude{/longitude}

field.name: ogstreet-address
field.label: Select og Street Address
field.description: Embed Code {street-address}street address{/street-address}

field.name: oglocality
field.label: Select og Locality
field.description: Typically City. Embed Code {locality}locality{/locality}

field.name: ogregion
field.label: Select og Region
field.description: Typically State. Embed Code {region}region{/region}

field.name: ogpostal-code
field.label: Select og Postal Code
field.description: Typically ZipCode. Embed Code {postal-code}postal code{/postal-code}

field.name: ogcountry-name
field.label: Select og Country Name
field.description: Embed Code {country-name}country name{/country-name}

field.name: ogemail
field.label: Select og Email
field.description: Embed Code {email}email{/email}

field.name: ogphone_number
field.label: Select og Phone Number
field.description: Embed Code {phone_number}country name{/phone_number}

field.name: ogfax_number
field.label: Select og Fax Number
field.description: Embed Code {fax_number}country name{/fax_number}

field.name: ogdeterminer
field.label: Select og Determiner
field.description: The word before the object's title. ie. 'the, an, a' This determiner will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogdeterminer}the/a/an/etc..{/ogdeterminer}.

field.name: ogaudio
field.label: Select og Audio
field.description: This audio URL will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogaudio}http://www.audio.com/audio.wav{/ogaudio}.

field.name: oglocale
field.label: Select og Locale
field.description: This locale will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {oglocale}en_US{/oglocale}.

field.name: ogsitename
field.label: Select og Site Name
field.description: This Site Name will be used on all pages or use Embed code {ogsitename}yoursitename{/ogsitename}.

field.name: ogvideo
field.label: Select og Video
field.description: This video URL will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogvideo}http://www.yourvideo.com/video.avi{/ogvideo}.

field.name: ogimagesecure
field.label: Select og Image Secure
field.description: If using https: // This will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogimagesecure}https://yourimage.com/ogp.jpg{/ogimagesecure}.

field.name: ogimagetype
field.label: Select og Image Type
field.description: Image MIME type. This will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogimagetype}image/jpeg{/ogimagetype}.

field.name: ogimagewidth
field.label: Select og Image Width
field.description: Image width in pixels. This will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogimagewidth}640{/ogimagewidth}.

field.name: ogimageheight
field.label: Select og Image Height
field.description: Image height in pixels. This will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogimageheight}480{/ogimageheight}.

field.name: ogvideosecure
field.label: Select og Video Secure
field.description: If using https: // This will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogvideosecure}https://yourvideo.com/ogp.avi{/ogvideosecure}.

field.name: ogvideotype
field.label: Select og Video Type
field.description: Video MIME type. This will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogvideotype}video/mpeg{/ogvideotype}.

field.name: ogvideowidth
field.label: Select og Video Width
field.description: Video width in pixels. This will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogvideowidth}640{/ogvideowidth}.

field.name: ogvideoheight
field.label: Select og Video Height
field.description: Video height in pixels. This will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogvideoheight}480{/ogvideoheight}.

field.name: ogaudiosecure
field.label: Select og Audio Secure
field.description: If using https: // This will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogaudiosecure}https://youraudio.com/ogp.wav{/ogaudiosecure}.

field.name: ogaudiotype
field.label: Select og Audio Type
field.description: Audio MIME type. This will be used on all pages or use Embed Code {ogaudiotype}audio/vnd.wav{/ogaudiotype}.

field.name: sbo1
field.label: Force Button Order
field.description: Set the Button Display Order 1-20

field.name: gojembed
field.label: Load Javascript?
field.description: If you disable this you must include the Google Javascript Library Reference yourself.

field.name: gocss
field.label: CSS style
field.description: Insert a style for the button

field.name: goheight
field.label: Button Height
field.description: Set the Button height in pixels.

field.name: gowidth
field.label: Button Width
field.description: Set the Button width in pixels.

field.name: gooutput
field.label: Output type
field.description: Output type (Standard HTML, HTML5)

field.name: sizegoogle
field.label: Google +1 Layout Style
field.description: Determines the size and shape of the Google +1 Button.

field.name: annotation
field.label: Annotation
field.description: Annotation: None, Inline, or Bubble.

field.name: golang
field.label: Language
field.description: Language Selection

field.name: gourl
field.label: Custom URL
field.description: If you wish to use a specific URL place it here.

field.name: fb1
field.label: Facebook Like
field.description: Enable Facebook like button?

field.name: sbo2
field.label: Force Button Order
field.description: Set the Button Display Order 1-20

field.name: fbjembed
field.label: Load Javascript
field.description: Include the Javascript (If no you must include it yourself).

field.name: fbcss
field.label: CSS style
field.description: Insert a style for the button

field.name: fbheight
field.label: Height
field.description: Choose the height in pixels.

field.name: fbwidth
field.label: Width
field.description: Choose the width in pixels.

field.name: fboutput
field.label: Output
field.description: How button is rendered

field.name: fbappid
field.label: App ID (for JavaScript SDK)
field.description: If you plan to use XFBML then you have to install the JavaScript SDK which requires getting an App ID. Put your App ID here.

field.name: fbsendbutton
field.label: Send Button
field.description: Display the send button allow users to send content to their friends. (Only works if using XFBML)

field.name: fbautourl
field.label: Auto URL Discovery
field.description: Automatically use current page URL

field.name: fburl
field.label: Facebook URL
field.description: URL to your facebook page.

field.name: fblayout
field.label: Layout Style
field.description: Choose your Facebook Layout Style.

field.name: fbfaces
field.label: Show Faces
field.description: Standard Layout Only

field.name: fbverb
field.label: Verb to Display
field.description: Verb to display on the button.

field.name: fbfont
field.label: Font
field.description: Font to use

field.name: fbcolor
field.label: Color Scheme
field.description: The Color Scheme for the like button.

field.name: fblocale
field.label: Language
field.description: Language Selection

field.label: Large Button

field.name: twvia
field.label: Tweet Via @username
field.description: The twitter username that this tweet originated from.

field.name: twhashtag
field.label: Put a related #hashtag here.
field.description: This is how people will find your tweets when they search. Choose a good #hashtag.

field.name: twuser

field.description: If you wish to use a specific URL place it here.

field.label: Choose Button Type
field.description: Choose either the standard pin it button or the 'bookmarklet' button (bookmarklet loads images from page automatically)

field.name: pijembed

field.description: Include the Javascript (Only enable once per page).

field.label: User ID
field.description: If you wish to receive attribution for all shares from your location, place your user ID here (optional).

field.name: sbo20
field.label: Force Button Order
field.description: Set the button display order 1-20

field.name: fljembed
field.label: Include Javascript?
field.description: If you disable this you must include the Javascript Library Reference yourself.

field.name: flcss
field.label: CSS style
field.description: Insert a style for the button

field.name: flheight
field.label: Button Height
field.description: Set the Button height in pixels.

field.name: flwidth
field.label: Button Width
field.description: Set the Button width in pixels.

field.name: flstyle
field.label: Foursquare Like Layout Style
field.description: Determines the size and shape of the Foursquare Like Button.

field.name: flid
field.label: Page ID
field.description: The ID of the Venue, Page that you wish to make available for liking. This field is required.

field.name: flname
field.label: Entity Name
field.description: This is the Name of the Venue, Page you wish to make available for liking. This field is optional.
